Html:
Hello, are there any plans to include support for exporting and importing synonoumous for term sets?

Thanks!

Gabo

You cannot represent synonyms or translations of terms by using a managed metadata import file. To create synonyms or translations you must either use the Term Store Management Tool (web access) or write a custom program to import and add the synonyms or translations.

http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee424396.aspx#section2
